name: Shop Sweet Fruit - Juice Blast
description:
Shop Sweet Fruit - Juice Blast is great free fruit match-3 puzzle game, match the same color fruits vertically, horizontally or diagonally as much as you can.
Complete the mission within the limited movements, match 3 or more cute fruits in the same color vertically, horizontally or diagonally.
Shop Sweet Fruit - Juice Blast Features:
- Match three action puzzle gameplay.
- Burst bunches of fruits & remove fruits in juicy explosion.
- Colorful and vivid fruits.
- Easy to learn, hard to master.
- Exciting and delicious fruit trip.
- Hundreds of sweet levels,updates will be continued!
